about_the_game:
This album features unforgettable songs from Arma, DayZ, Ylands, Vigor, and other titles from Bohemia Interactive. The music was written by the studio's house composers Ján Dušek, Dominik Svoboda, Varhan Orchestrovič Bauer, and Ondřej Konvička. Also present is Ondřej Matějka, composer of the original musical theme for the Arma series.

Immerse yourself in a musical journey through the universe of Bohemia Interactive. Experience the unique connection between video games and symphonic music performed by the Czech National Symphony Orchestra. Celebrate the anniversary of one of the Czech Republic’s biggest studios.
